name: Glucosamine
description: Amino sugar traditionally used for joint health, but emerging large-scale epidemiological data shows remarkable association with reduced all-cause mortality (18-39% reduction), comparable to regular exercise. May work via mTOR pathway modulation.

dosage.notes: Glucosamine sulfate or HCl. Large UK Biobank studies showed mortality benefit. May mimic aspects of fasting via hexosamine pathway.

keyFindings: Regular users had 18-39% lower all-cause mortality in UK Biobank (500,000+ participants)
